title: Matplotlib Subplot Creation Tutorial
description: In data visualization, it is often necessary to plot multiple graphs in a single figure. Matplotlib allows us to achieve this using subplots. In this lab, we will learn how to create subplots in Matplotlib.

meta.description: Learn how to create subplots in Matplotlib for effective data visualization.
